head.supplied: ¶ [Reply to a letter asking for a Catalogue of the Books lately purchased from him] ¶ McCulloch's inward correspondence register includes an entry dated 29 June1866, 'Dr Mueller to be asked for catal...

div.p: No. 6240, vol. 1866 N, VPRS 1168 inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letter dated 30 June 1866.
[Reply to a letter asking for a Catalogue of the Books lately purchased from him]
McCulloch's inward correspondence register includes an entry dated 29 June1866, 'Dr Mueller to be asked for catalogue of books purchased from him'.No indication is given as to who asked for this request to be made, butit was done;see J. Moore to M, 29 June 1866. Acataloguehad in fact beenincluded in M to J. McCulloch, 30 September 1865,andhad beenpublished (B65.10.01).M's replyto the present inquirywas referred back to him on 6 July 1866 annotated: 'if the books are not open to the public they ought to be'. The file was recalled to the Chief Secretary's Department on 29 August 1873; see also M to J. Francis, August 1873 (in this edition as 73-08-00).
